00026 #pragma once
00027 
00028 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00029 #include <l4/re/protocols>
00030 
00031 namespace L4Re {
00032 class Dataspace;
00033 
00034 // MISSING:
00035 // * alignment constraints
00036 // * shall we support superpages in noncont memory?
00037 
00069 class L4_EXPORT Mem_alloc :
00070   public L4::Kobject_t<Mem_alloc, L4::Kobject, L4Re::Protocol::Mem_alloc>
00071 {
00072   L4_KOBJECT(Mem_alloc)
00073 
00074 public:
00078   enum Mem_alloc_flags
00079   {
00080     Continuous   = 0x01, 
00081     Pinned       = 0x02, 
00082     Super_pages  = 0x04, 
00083   };
00097   long alloc(unsigned long size, L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem,
00098              unsigned long flags = 0) const throw();
00108   long free(L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem) const throw();
00109 
00110 };
00111 
00112 };
